text:
Mr, Harry J. Skomiz
October 12, 1959
KTCA suffering, I will have to make other arrangements.
This is a great country in Minnesota. I'm sure I don't have to
tell you that. The change has been good for me. This is a marvelous
place to work. It's nice to be associated with an organization that
has seme real pioneering spirit. If I ever manage to catch up with
John, I'll probably find out that he has blasted off for outer space.
Looking forward to seeing you October 27th.
Sincere Iv.
Sr.
Programs
CRT: gn
c.c. John C. Schwarzwalder
